tasks.label: Build OMNeT++ project
tasks.command: cmd /c "setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion & if exist makefrag ( set MAKE=mingw32-make ) else ( set MAKE=make ) & if exist Makefile.vc ( nmake /f Makefile.vc ) else ( !MAKE! -j %NUMBER_OF_PROCESSORS% )"

tasks.label: Build OMNeT++ project
tasks.command: cmd /c "setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion ^& if exist makefrag ( set MAKE=mingw32-make ) else ( set MAKE=make ) ^& if exist Makefile.vc ( nmake /f Makefile.vc ) else ( !MAKE! -j %NUMBER_OF_PROCESSORS% )"
